name: cicd-utils
label: CICD Utils
description: CICD provides the out of box actions for CICD solution pack

operations.title: Unzip Export Template
operations.description: Unzip the specified downloaded zip export template

parameters.title: Filepath
parameters.name: filepath
parameters.description: Specify the file path on the filesystem

operations.title: Split Export Template
operations.description: Split the export template recordset into Production Content, Production Settings and Development Settings export template recordset

parameters.title: Prod Content Filepath
parameters.name: prod_content_filepath
parameters.placeholder: /tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Content.json
parameters.description: Specify the filename of production content export template, which you want to create in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: filepath under /tmp directory e.g. "/tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Content.json"

parameters.title: Prod Content JSON
parameters.name: prod_content_json
parameters.description: Specify the json of production content export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the json of production content export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset

parameters.title: Prod Settings Filepath
parameters.name: prod_settings_filepath
parameters.placeholder: /tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Settings.json
parameters.description: Specify the filename of production settings export template, which you want to create in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: filepath under /tmp directory e.g. "/tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Settings.json"

parameters.title: Prod Settings JSON
parameters.name: prod_settings_json
parameters.description: Specify the json of production settings export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the json of production settings export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset

parameters.title: Dev Settings Filepath
parameters.name: dev_settings_filepath
parameters.placeholder: /tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Development Settings.json
parameters.description: Specify the filename of development settings export template, which you want to create in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: filepath under /tmp directory e.g. "/tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Development Settings.json"

parameters.title: Dev Settings JSON
parameters.name: dev_settings_json
parameters.description: Specify the json of development settings export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the json of development settings export template, which you want to add in export_templates recordset

parameters.title: Unzip Export Template Filepath
parameters.name: unzip_filepath
parameters.description: Specify the unzip export template filepath under /tmp directory
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unzip export template filepath under /tmp directory

parameters.title: Split Zip Export Template filename
parameters.name: zip_filename
parameters.description: Specify the split zip export template filename
parameters.tooltip: Specify the split zip export template filename
